item.title: The Bondi Beach Shooting Shows ISIS Threat in Australia and Beyond
item.description: With the Islamic State now linked to the Bondi Beach terror attack, authorities need to redouble efforts to counter the groupâ€™s enduring appeal, especially during the yearend holiday period.
